plugins.name: Font Theme
plugins.description:
Not all fonts that go well together match the theme of your design. This AI powered plugin lets you describe your design and its intended audience and then suggests font pairs that match the theme you entered. You can also simply just type in the vibe or feeling you want the font to evoke.


The best part? You can save the fonts and all their weights as text styles in your Figma with the click of a button!


The text styles will save the font weights as numbers because that's how developers code font weights. This will ease the communication with your developers because you'll get familiar with how they refer to font weights.
plugins.tagline: Search for font pairs to match the feeling of your design.

122088.name: Font Theme
122088.description:
Not all fonts that go well together match the theme of your design. This AI powered plugin lets you describe your design and its intended audience and then suggests font pairs that match the theme you entered. You can also simply just type in the vibe or feeling you want the font to evoke.


The best part? You can save the fonts and all their weights as text styles in your Figma with the click of a button!


The text styles will save the font weights as numbers because that's how developers code font weights. This will ease the communication with your developers because you'll get familiar with how they refer to font weights.
122088.release_notes: Now creates matches from all Figma fonts compared to only Google fonts in the previous version.
122088.tagline: Search for font pairs to match the feeling of your design.

plugins.name: Adtraction Table Generator
plugins.description:
A specialized Figma plugin designed exclusively for Adtraction employees to streamline the process of converting complex Excel reports into presentation-ready Figma tables.


Key Features:

  1. 📊 Automatically splits large Excel files into separate tables
  2. 🎯 Purpose-built for Adtraction's reporting structure:
  3. Koncern (Group) tables
  4. Moderbolag (Parent company) tables
  5. Other financial data tables
  6. 🎨 Maintains Adtraction's brand typography with Lexend font
  7. 🔍 Preview tables before generation
  8. ⚡️ Bulk processing of multiple tables from a single Excel file
  9. 🔒 Local processing for data security


Perfect Use Case:

Designed specifically for Adtraction's quarterly and annual financial reporting workflow. When you have one large Excel file containing multiple tables of financial data, this plugin automatically:

  1. Identifies different table sections
  2. Splits them into separate tables
  3. Applies appropriate styling based on table type (koncern/moderbolag)
  4. Generates all tables with consistent formatting


Ideal for:

  1. Adtraction financial team members
  2. Corporate communications staff
  3. Anyone working with Adtraction's financial reports in Figma

This is a niche tool optimized for Adtraction's specific needs, making the process of converting financial Excel data into presentation-ready Figma tables quick and consistent.


Note: This plugin is primarily intended for Adtraction employees and is optimized for their internal Excel report format and brand guidelines.
plugins.tagline: Transform Adtraction Excel reports into perfectly formatted Figma tables  ✨

plugins.name: Structura Swagger Annotator
plugins.description:
Description

Structura revolutionizes how you manage API, design, and copy documentation. With an all-in-one platform, gain clarity on workflows, discover the exact APIs and components used, and ensure precise copies across your designs.


How To?

  1. Run this plugin into your figma files
  2. Paste the whole swagger documentation
  3. Select one of the component and map it by filling the correct path and method
  4. To update the swagger just reupload again the whole json swagger


Feature Request?

Feel free to request more features, for this plugin. Next roadmap for this plugin will be:

  1. Code generation for API request
  2. Hands On API Request on Plugin
  3. Copywriter integration(such as integrating with lokalise)
plugins.tagline: Simplify API and Design documentation by annotating component with swagger API docs.

  3. Copywriter integration(such as integrating with lokalise)

plugins.name: Text With Styles
plugins.description:
# Flutter Text Style Inspector


A powerful Figma plugin that bridges the gap between Figma text styles and Flutter's Material Design text theme system. This plugin helps developers and designers maintain consistency between Figma designs and Flutter implementations by automatically mapping Figma text styles to their corresponding Flutter TextTheme properties.


## Features


### Real-time Style Inspection

- Instantly view text style information for any selected text layer

- Live updates as you select different text elements

- Support for multiple text selection with smart duplicate filtering


### Comprehensive Style Information

- Displays the complete Figma text style name

- Shows associated color token information

- Previews the actual text content

- Automatically generates corresponding Flutter TextTheme code


### Smart Flutter Code Generation

- Automatically maps Figma text styles to Flutter's Material Design text theme

- Supports all standard Material text styles:

- Headlines (Large, Medium, Small)

- Titles (Large, Medium, Small)

- Body text (with weight variations)

- Labels (Large, Medium, Small)

- Includes font weight handling for body styles (w400, w500, w600)


### User-Friendly Interface

- Clean, organized display of style information

- Easy-to-copy Flutter code snippets

- Compact, floating UI that stays out of your way

- Simple click-outside-to-close functionality


## How to Use


1. Select any text layer(s) in your Figma design

2. The plugin will automatically display:

- The applied Figma text style

- The color token (if available)

- A preview of the text content

- The equivalent Flutter TextTheme code

3. Copy the generated Flutter code directly into your application


## Best Practices


- Name your Figma text styles to match Material Design conventions for automatic mapping

- Use consistent style names to ensure accurate Flutter code generation

- Apply color styles to text layers for complete token information

- Select multiple text layers to quickly inspect all text styles in a component


Perfect for teams working with both Figma and Flutter, this plugin streamlines the handoff process and ensures design consistency across platforms.
plugins.tagline: Select any layer and get its texts with styles

plugins.name: Nataicons
plugins.description:
A fun-themed simple open source icon featuring over 200 delightful design. A free and expansive icon library right inside Figma.


🔑 Key Features


  1. 200+ Unique Icons: A diverse collection to suit various design needs.
  2. Drag and Drop: Seamlessly add icons to your designs.
  3. Free for All: Use in personal and commercial projects without restrictions.
  4. Developer-Friendly: Available as React and Vue packages for easy integration.


💡 How It Works


  1. Open plugin and browse our extensive icon collection.
  2. Drag your chosen icon directly into your file.
  3. Customize and resize as needed.


👍 Like this? Tip me at coff.ee/afnizarnur
plugins.tagline: A fun-themed simple open source icon.

plugins.name: Modyo Figma Plugin
plugins.description:
The Modyo Figma Plugin is an essential tool for designers working within the Dynamic Framework. This plugin streamlines your design-to-development workflow with three core functionalities:


Export CSS as Variables: Seamlessly export your design elements as CSS variables tailored for the Dynamic Framework. This feature ensures consistency and speeds up the handoff process, making it easier for developers to implement designs directly from Figma.


Generate Color Palette: Effortlessly create and customize color palettes directly within Figma. This feature allows you to generate a range of colors that can be easily adjusted and applied across your design system, ensuring brand consistency and flexibility.


Font Size Generator Based on PX: Simplify your typography management with a font size generator that operates based on pixel values. This allows for easy creation of a typographic scale that aligns with your design requirements, ensuring responsive and visually appealing text styles.


The Modyo Figma Plugin is designed to empower designers and developers, making collaboration smoother and more efficient by providing a unified toolkit for creating consistent and high-quality UI components.
plugins.tagline: A plugin for Dynamic Framework

Generate Color Palette: Effortlessly create and customize color palettes directly within Figma. This feature allows you to generate a range of colors that can be easily adjusted and applied across your design system, ensuring brand consistency and flexibility.


Font Size Generator Based on PX: Simplify your typography management with a font size generator that operates based on pixel values. This allows for easy creation of a typographic scale that aligns with your design requirements, ensuring responsive and visually appealing text styles.


The Modyo Figma Plugin is designed to empower designers and developers, making collaboration smoother and more efficient by providing a unified toolkit for creating consistent and high-quality UI components.

plugins.name: Easy Select
plugins.description:
Easy Select helps you expedite the tedious and repetitive selection workflows with handy 1-click shortcuts.


-> Simply select one item, then:

  1. Select its parent / children / siblings
  2. Select others with the same color, name, size, rotation ...


-> Or, select a few items, then:

  1. Filter down to those with a particular type, name...


-> Save your carefully curated selections as bookmarks for reuse.


-> Restore from a list of historical selections.


For questions or feedback, please email easy-select@smarter.town.
plugins.tagline: The all-in-one selection helper

plugins.name: Corners Alignment
plugins.description:
主要功能


1. 多矩形圆角对齐

选中多个矩形时：

▸ 自动取最大矩形为基准

▸ 同步小矩形圆角弧度，实现视觉边距等距效果

▸ 非等比例对齐时，按最小间距自动计算


2. 容器内元素圆角对齐

选中 Frame/组件/实例时：

▸ 自动识别为容器

▸ 调整所有首层子元素（矩形/Frame等）的圆角


Main Features


1. Multi-Rectangle Corner Alignment

On selecting multiple rectangles:

▸ Takes largest rectangle as reference

▸ Syncs smaller rectangles' corners for visual equidistance

▸ Uses min-spacing calculation for non-proportional alignment


2. Container Element Alignment

On selecting Frame/Component/Instance:

▸ Identifies as container

▸ Adjusts corners of all top-level child elements
plugins.tagline: 对齐嵌套圆角 Align nested corners

136753.release_notes:
增加了ui界面，新增了最小圆角值和平滑圆角值设置，新增了邻近角对齐模式(适用于九宫格之类的网格自动布局)。
Added UI interface, added minimum corner radius and smooth corner radius settings, added adjacent corner alignment mode (suitable for grid automatic layouts such as 3x3 grids).
136753.tagline: 对齐嵌套圆角 Align nested corners

plugins.name: Style Base
plugins.description:
Stylebase – The Ultimate Design Token Generator for Figma


Stylebase is your all-in-one Figma plugin to supercharge your design workflow. Instantly generate and customize color styles, typography styles, shadow styles, grid systems, and spacing tokens — all from one powerful tool. Whether you're designing a new UI kit or refining an existing design system, Stylebase helps you stay consistent and efficient.


With just one click, you can:

  1. Create all design styles for your project
  2. Generate a fully documented style guide for easy handoff and team alignment


Built for designers, by designers — Stylebase gives you full control and flexibility with customizable presets, responsive token scaling, and seamless integration into any design system.


🎨 Say goodbye to manual setup.

⚡ Say hello to pixel-perfect consistency.


Perfect for: UX/UI Designers, Design System Creators, Product Teams, and Freelancers.

accepted.name: Siddhant giri
accepted.description: Product Designer and a Frontend Developer from India.

plugins.tagline: Style & Document your Design System Faster!

plugins.name: Syntax Highlighter
plugins.description:
How to use


Applying syntax highlighting colors


  1. Select a text layer containing a code snippet.
  2. Choose a programming language, if required (the plugin will try to identify the language automatically).
  3. Choose a theme.
  4. Toggle include background and line numbers, if required.
  5. Click Apply.


Clearing syntax highlighting colors


  1. Select a text layer containing a formatted code snippet.
  2. Click the Clear formatting button.


Adding custom Visual Studio themes


  1. Open Visual Studio Code.
  2. Install the desired color theme and switch to the theme in Visual Studio Code.
  3. Press Ctrl + Shift + P and run Developer: Generate Color Theme from current settings.
  4. Select the file's contents and copy.
  5. Open the Figma plugin and press the Create a new theme button.
  6. Paste into the Create a new theme dialog and click Save.


Note: This plugin supports up to 10 custom themes.

accepted.name: Microsoft
accepted.description: The official account for Microsoft Design.

plugins.tagline: Apply syntax highlighting colors to code snippets.

plugins.name: PRE: AI Design Review
plugins.description:
PRE helps designers and product teams understand how users will interact with their UI designs — before a single line of code is written.


🔹 Select any frame in Figma and click “Upload Selected Frame” to send it to PRE.

🔹 PRE will automatically generate a heatmap, predict click-through rates, and provide UX suggestions using AI.

🔹 You can modify the generated tags, draw additional clickable elements, or toggle the heatmap overlay on and off using the second button in the top bar.

🔹 Once you're happy with the predictions, you can download the heatmap and click data for further analysis or presentation.


Whether you're working on early wireframes or high-fidelity mocks, PRE helps you make design decisions backed by predictive user analytics — all from right inside Figma.


Powered by PRE
plugins.tagline: Export any Figma frame and instantly generate heatmaps, CTR predictions and UX feedback with PRE.

plugins.description:
Fillio - Less Typing, More Designing


Fillio is the simplest way to populate your Figma designs with realistic {{placeholder}} content. Whether you’re working on wireframes, prototypes, invoices, brand books, or daily UI design, Fillio saves you time by instantly filling your artboards with dynamic content.



Key Features:


Quick & Easy Filling:

Fill your designs with placeholders like names, addresses, and all type of contents in a single click.


Customizable Placeholders:

Use simple tags like {{name}} or {{Date}} to create dynamic content that fits your design.


Efficient Workflow:

Skip the tedious task of manually adding content—let Fillio do the heavy lifting.


Perfect for Prototypes & Wireframes:

Make your designs look polished even in early stages, without all the manual effort.



How it Works:


  1. Install Fillio from the Figma Community.
  2. Select the elements or frames where you want to add placeholders.
  3. Define Your Placeholders using simple tags like {{name}} or {{Type}}.
  4. Click “Submit”, and Fillio automatically adds content to your design.



Get Started with Fillio Today!

accepted.name: Mohammed M.Akasha
accepted.description: A User-centered Designer who crafts meaningful products through design.

plugins.tagline: Less Filling.. More designing.

plugins.name: Duplication
plugins.description:
Figma Duplication Plugin

What It Does

The Figma Duplication Plugin is designed to create multiple copies of a selected frame, automatically populating text fields with data from a CSV file. Key features include:


  1. Bulk Duplication: Create multiple copies of a selected frame
  2. Dynamic Text Replacement: Update text content in each duplicate using CSV data
  3. Organized Layout: Automatically arrange duplicates in a grid layout within a new section

How To Use It

  1. Select a Frame: First, select the frame you want to duplicate in your Figma file.


  1. Launch the Plugin: Open the Duplication Plugin from your plugins panel.


Configure Settings:

  1. Enter the number of copies you want to create
  2. Select which text layers you want to modify (you can add multiple)
  3. Upload a CSV file containing the data for text replacement

CSV Format Requirements:


  1. The CSV headers must exactly match the names of the text layers you want to modify
  2. Each row represents data for one duplicate
  3. The plugin will read values from the columns corresponding to your selected text layers
  4. Click Submit: The plugin will create your duplicates in a new section with all text fields updated according to your CSV data.


Limitations

  1. Works only with frames containing text layers
  2. CSV headers must exactly match the text layer names


This plugin is ideal for creating multiple versions of components that differ only in text content, such as cards, buttons, or profile items with different data
plugins.tagline: Tired of filling in your data? just use this ! :D

It enhances the design handoff process by providing a structured way to document and share feedback directly within Figma. plugins.name: SmartTableFill
plugins.description:
SmartTableFill is a GPT-powered plugin designed for intelligent table population with contextual data. Unlike basic data fillers, SmartTableFill analyzes existing content to generate relevant entries, making it ideal for tasks like: creating email addresses based on user names, generating addresses aligned with specified cities, or calculating percentages based on given numbers.


Choose between basic and contextual modes to quickly populate tables for mockups, prototyping, and presentations. Customizable settings allow you to target specific text nodes, saving time on manual entry and bringing a smarter approach to data generation.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly populate tables with smart, contextual data using GPT

110927.name: SmartTableFill
110927.description:

Unlike basic data fillers, SmartTableFill analyzes existing content to generate relevant entries, making it ideal for tasks like: creating email addresses based on user names, generating addresses aligned with specified cities, or calculating percentages based on given numbers.


Choose between basic and contextual modes to quickly populate tables for mockups, prototyping, and presentations. Customizable settings allow you to target specific text nodes, saving time on manual entry and bringing a smarter approach to data generation.

plugins.name: Toggle Visibility By Type
plugins.description:
Toggle Visibility by Type is designed to streamline your design workflow by allowing you to quickly toggle the visibility of selected layers based on their type.

Whether you’re working with 🖼️ images, 📝 text, 🔲 shapes, 🔗 paths, ↔️ lines, 📁 groups, or 📐 frames, this plugin provides an intuitive interface to control which elements are visible in your design. Simply select the layers or groups you want to modify, choose the layer type you want to toggle, and hit the ☑️ button.


This plugin is especially useful for managing complex designs and improving your efficiency in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Quickly toggle visibility of selected layers by type!

plugins.name: Behind the frame
plugins.description:
Опис﻿ание

Случаются ситуации, когда объекты оказываются за фреймами и вы не знаете какие из них. Как бы вы их не нашли, при большом количестве фреймов поместить их в нужный в панели слоев не самое простое занятие, а вынести за пределы и снова внутрь не гарантирует поместить на тоже место. Этот плагин упрощает это действие.


Select all out-of-frame objects

Selects all objects that are out of frames.


Objects in frames

Places all selected objects in the frames above them.

  1. Select the objects along with the frames and run the script.
  2. All selected objects will end up in the frames they visually match.


Выбрать всё вне фреймов

Выбирает все объекты которые находятся вне фреймов.


Объекты во фреймы

Помещает все выделенные объекты во фреймы над которыми находятся.

  1. Выделите объекты вместе с фреймами и запустите скрипт.
  2. Все выделенные объекты окажутся во фреймах с которыми совпадают визуально.
plugins.tagline: In order to place objects that are behind frames into frames

81981.name: Behind the frame
81981.description:

plugins.name: Layer Organizer
plugins.description:
Layer Organizer

Is your Figma file a mess? Layers all over the place? Layer Organizer instantly organizes, groups, and aligns your selected layers — with real-time visual feedback.


🚀 Core Features:

  1. Auto Layer Organization: Instantly arranges and aligns selected layers for a clean, structured layout.
  2. Group Level Selection (1–5): Groups layers based on / in their names (e.g., Button/Primary), supporting deep hierarchies.
  3. Horizontal & Vertical Spacing: Set precise spacing between groups and layers. Quick presets: 200px, 400px, 1000px.
  4. Combine Single Layers: Merge single-layer groups into one clean “Ungrouped” group. Toggleable.


👀 Preview & Visualization:

  1. Real-Time Preview: See changes instantly as you organize.
  2. Group View: Visual list of group names and included layers, with type labels (Frame, Component, Vector, etc.).


⚙️ Settings & Shortcuts:

  1. Preference Memory: Automatically remembers your last settings for a smoother workflow.
  2. Default Values: Horizontal/Vertical spacing: 100px, Group level: 1, Combine single-layer groups: On.


⚡ Performance-First Architecture:

  1. Two-Stage Processing: Measures first, positions after — for faster, more accurate results.
  2. Safe Layer Sorting: Uses a temporary frame to reorder layers while preserving hierarchy and structure.


Organize! Preview! Perfect! 🧼
plugins.tagline: Auto-arrange and group layers for a cleaner, more organized Figma canvas. 🧼

plugins.name: Dynamic Typescales
plugins.description:
Dynamic Typescales


Automatically adjust tracking and leading across your typescale for better rhythm and readability. Tightens spacing for large text and loosens it for small text, with sliders to control intensity and inputs to set your base values. Say goodbye to tedious manual tweaking!

plugins.name: Variant Multi-Selector
plugins.description:
Tired of manually selecting variant properties one by one?


Variant Multi-Selector solves this by allowing you to multi-select multiple properties and values together — and instantly filter, edit, and manage matching variants inside your component set! 🚀


✨ Key Features:

•Select multiple properties (like Size, State, Type) at once

•Apply filters and select matching variants instantly

•View bound variables attached to your variants (Figma Variables integration!)

•Designed for fast, large-scale Design System workflows


🔥 Perfect for:

•Design system builders

•Product designers managing large variant sets

•UI/UX designers who want to speed up Figma workflows


🙏 Built with love and real-world design pain.
plugins.tagline: Select and edit multiple variant properties at once.

plugins.name: Consistency Checker
plugins.description:
Consistency Checker is your all-in-one solution for ensuring your designs meet WCAG AA standards for text contrast. With a single click, check the accessibility of all text layers in a selected frame, helping you create more inclusive designs effortlessly.


Designing for accessibility shouldn't be an afterthought. Consistency Checker analyzes all text layers within a selected frame, instantly providing contrast ratio information and WCAG AA compliance status.


What This Plugin Does

  1. Evaluates text contrast ratios against backgrounds for all text layers simultaneously
  2. Shows WCAG AA pass/fail status for each text element
  3. Provides detailed contrast ratio measurements
  4. Allows quick navigation to problematic text layers with a single click
  5. Helps you identify accessibility issues early in your design process
  6. Generates comprehensive reports for documentation and team sharing


How It Works

  1. Select any frame containing text layers you want to evaluate
  2. Run Consistency Checker to instantly scan all text elements
  3. View a complete list of text layers with their contrast ratios and WCAG AA compliance status
  4. Click on any text layer in the results to jump directly to it in your design
  5. Make necessary adjustments to improve accessibility
  6. Re-scan to confirm your changes meet accessibility standards


Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users. Install Consistency Checker today!
plugins.tagline: Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users

129453.name: Consistency Checker
129453.description:

Designing for accessibility shouldn't be an afterthought. Consistency Checker analyzes all text layers within a selected frame, instantly providing contrast ratio information and WCAG AA compliance status.


What This Plugin Does

  1. Evaluates text contrast ratios against backgrounds for all text layers simultaneously
  2. Shows WCAG AA pass/fail status for each text element
  3. Provides detailed contrast ratio measurements
  4. Allows quick navigation to problematic text layers with a single click

How It Works

  3. View a complete list of text layers with their contrast ratios and WCAG AA compliance status
  4. Click on any text layer in the results to jump directly to it in your design

Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users. Install Consistency Checker today!

129453.tagline: Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users

plugins.name: dpicon - SVG Icons
plugins.description:
dpicon is a Figma plugin that provides 944 high-quality filled SVG icons for your design projects. Whether you're creating wireframes, prototypes, or polished UI designs, dpicon makes it easy to find and insert the perfect icon. Search for icons by name, double-click to place them on the canvas, or drag and drop for precise placement. With a sleek grid view and real-time search, dpicon streamlines your workflow and boosts productivity.


Key Features:

- 944 filled SVG icons, ready to use.

- Real-time search to quickly find icons.

- Double-click to place icons on the canvas.

- Lightweight and optimized for performance.


Perfect for designers looking to add professional icons to their Figma projects with ease.
plugins.tagline: Icons at Your Fingertips

plugins.name: Standardized icon
plugins.description:
This plugin can help you complete the standardization process after drawing icons and also enables the inheritance of color replacement for icon components.

1. Select the frame, then click [Standardize].

2. Generate the desired icon size.

It is recommended to watch this tutorial before using the plugin

https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1fB4y1G7TU/?spm_id_from=333.1387.search.video_card.click&vd_source=7989179b8f671e578572baf26d6ffb66
plugins.tagline: Standardize your icon drawing process

126949.description:

plugins.name: Create map 007
plugins.description: This Figma plugin helps create aisles to facilitate geolocation, making it easier to organize and structure spatial layouts efficiently.
plugins.tagline: create aisles to facilitate geolocation, making it easier to organize and structure spatial layouts

plugins.name: AddressClip
plugins.description:
AddressClip: Effortless Blockchain Address Generator

  1. Instantly randomize and format blockchain addresses for wallet, contract or token.
  2. Choose truncated or full display styles.
  3. Works with Ethereum and Solana addresses.
  4. Apply random addresses across multiple text layers.


Made for designers, by designer.
plugins.tagline: Format and customize blockchain addresses for better readability.

118853.tagline: Format and customize blockchain addresses for better readability.

plugins.name: Content Kit
plugins.description: his Figma plugin allows designers to quickly generate Nigerian-themed content directly within their projects, saving time and enhancing local relevance. The plugin includes customizable templates, authentic text content (e.g., Yoruba proverbs, Pidgin phrases, or local idioms), cultural icons, and elements inspired by Nigeria’s rich diversity. Whether designing for digital products, branding, or social media, the plugin ensures an authentic touch, fostering deeper connections with Nigerian audiences. Users can tweak settings to suit various languages, regions, and styles, making it a versatile tool for creative professionals.
plugins.tagline: Generate Nigerian names and more!

116144.name: Content Kit

Whether designing for digital products, branding, or social media, the plugin ensures an authentic touch, fostering deeper connections with Nigerian audiences. Users can tweak settings to suit various languages, regions, and styles, making it a versatile tool for creative professionals.

plugins.name: Cover Maker

— Add Jira ID to display on the cover

plugins.name: Psi Figma Plugin
plugins.description:
Eliminate the hassle of searching for brand assets with the "Psi Figma Plugin". Instantly access Property Shop Investment LLC’s logos, colors, fonts, and more to streamline your design workflow.


Stay consistent and on-brand effortlessly with the "Psi Figma Plugin", crafted to centralize all your assets in one convenient place.


Key Features of the “ Psi Figma Plugin” :


  1. Import Property Shop Investment LLC’s brand assets directly into Figma.


  1. Access the latest logos, icons, colors, fonts, and design essentials with ease.


  1. Sync your Property Shop Investment LLC brand assets for fast and centralized access.



About Psi Figma Plugin :


The "Psi Figma Plugin" is the ultimate tool for managing Property Shop Investment LLC’s brand assets. It ensures Our brand stays consistent and accessible, empowering Our designs with the most up-to-date materials directly within Figma.


Have Questions or Feedback? Contact us at a.jarwan@psinv.net

accepted.name: Alaa Jarwan
accepted.description: UI/UX Designer passionate about crafting intuitive and visually engaging digital experiences. Blends creativity with functionality to enhance user interaction

plugins.tagline: "Psi Figma Plugin: Our Brand, Seamlessly Streamlined."

plugins.name: CSS Custom Property to Figma
plugins.description:
1. Register CSS Color Custom Properties

• Simply copy CSS color custom properties and paste them into the input field.

• The plugin automatically parses and registers them as styles or variables.


2. Fast and Simple Conversion Flow

• Complete the flow with ease: paste your CSS code → Apply

• No complex setup required.
plugins.tagline: Converts CSS color custom properties into styles or variables
